## Delay.tap() method

Reads value at `t` relative to current write position. `t` should be in `(-âˆž..0)` interval. E.g. `tap(-1)` returns the second most recent value written.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tap(t: number): T;
```

|  t | <code>number</code> |  |
